channel.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
channel.description: Hey guys! at first: you made a great job! i love your mod! but now i can´t go on. i just killed these tentacels at the blast pit. and if i try to go on, the game always crashes when it loads the next map. i tried to load the next map manually. the map loaded, i looked around for like 45° and crash again. i hope the mdmp file will help you and you will be able to help me to go on. regards Jul3z hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T14_44_43C0.mdmp (103 KB)

item.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
item.dc:creator: JesterPrime
item.description:
Worked for me as well, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
item.dc:creator: Jul3z
item.description:
angelofdeath1000:

I had this problem.

I turned all my settings right down and was able to carry on, and turned them back up after I got to the next level. It was fine after that.

ha, awesome!! this helped me too. thanks a lot! but the devs should really check this.

Read full topic

item.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
item.dc:creator: angelofdeath1000
item.description:
I had this problem.

I turned all my settings right down and was able to carry on, and turned them back up after I got to the next level. It was fine after that.

item.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
item.dc:creator: JuKiLa
item.description:
First of Great game, thank you very much , been waiting for it since ages^^

I have the same problem when looking upwards i can drop down into the water. once in i can get out. when looking around the “room”, at a certain angle when something burning comes into the pic, the game crashens

I have added in some crash reports from different angles, hope they help

would be very thankfull for a workaround or so

hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T15_27_6C0.mdmp (110 KB)

item.title: Game keeps crashing after tentacles
item.dc:creator: Jul3z
item.description:
Hey guys!
at first: you made a great job! i love your mod!

but now i can´t go on. i just killed these tentacels at the blast pit. and if i try to go on, the game always crashes when it loads the next map.
i tried to load the next map manually. the map loaded, i looked around for like 45° and crash again.
i hope the mdmp file will help you and you will be able to help me to go on.

regards Jul3z
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T14_44_43C0.mdmp (103 KB)

Read full topic
